channel.title: Fortissimo on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Fortissimo on Chaotic Online

item.title: Blight Fight
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Garv, the OverWorld Caretaker in charge of Lake Morn, helping Tom (and Smildon) to heal the Prexxor Chasm from the Blight instead of fighting it by brute-force

item.title: Castle Bodhran or Bust (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the story of Reginald Terrington, the problems in which he got himself and the friends’ group attempt to rescue him with a bet that could mean the end of the career in Chaotic of one of them.

item.title: From the Deep (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode, a mysterious Creature from a long forgotten past arises again with astonishing and disturbing revelations about the future of Perim

item.title: Out in the Cold
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz’s journey through a dangerous path, with an unusual guidance, to the aid of the reclusive Raimusa in the Crystal Range.

item.title: Scavenger Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton competing with each other (again) to see who is the best player of Chaotic between them.

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?

item.title: Unexpected
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the fourth member of the group, Peyton, and his… “eccentric”, personality.

item.title: Welcome to Chaotic (Part 1)
item.description: In the first episode of the series, the protagonist, Tom Majors, receives his access code for Chaotic, a place where, according to his best friend, Kaz, you can turn into the Creatures and play for real.

item.title: Welcome to Chaotic (Part 2)
item.description: In continuation of the series, after entering his access code, Tom discovers that all of Kaz’s fantasies were real and has his first battle in Chaotic
